title: Geas
description: Aoi, Itsuki and Aya are on their way to Japan to introduce Aya to Itsuki's family. Aya worries Itsuki's parents won't like him, but Aoi and Itsuki know better. His unusual family welcome Aya with open arms, but things are not all going right. Itsuki shifts into his fox and can't change back, and there's an air of dark magic about it. Aoi has a feeling he knows what's going on, and confronts the magic user responsible, but will he be able to lift the curse on Itsuki? Itsuki and Aya are ready to mount a rescue, but will they be able to get to Aoi in time? Find out in this second installment of Between a Fox and a Hard Place!
author: Misa Izanaki
